main.description: Update an existing comment's content, facets, embed, languages, or labels. Threading references (reply.root and reply.parent) are immutable and cannot be changed.

uri.description: AT-URI of the comment to update

facets.description: Updated annotations for rich text (mentions, links, etc.)

embed.description: Updated embedded media or quoted posts

langs.description: Updated languages used in the comment content (ISO 639-1)

uri.description: AT-URI of the updated comment (unchanged from input)

cid.description: New CID of the updated comment record

errors.name: CommentNotFound
errors.description: Comment with the specified URI does not exist

errors.name: ContentTooLong
errors.description: Updated comment content exceeds maximum length constraints

errors.name: ContentEmpty
errors.description: Updated comment content is empty or contains only whitespace

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.description: User is not authorized to update this comment (not the author)
